title: How to Make Panko Fried Shrimp

steps.title: Defrost shrimp if it is frozen.
steps.content: Defrost shrimp if it is frozen. [1] X Research source Soak it in hot or warm water so it could defrost faster.

steps.title: Take out shrimp shells and throw them in the garbage.
steps.content: Take out shrimp shells and throw them in the garbage. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Season shrimp with salt and pepper, making sure all sides are seasoned well.
steps.content: Season shrimp with salt and pepper, making sure all sides are seasoned well. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Add Panko crumbs to a large plastic food storage bag.
steps.content: Add Panko crumbs to a large plastic food storage bag. Shake well.

steps.title: Butterfly
steps.content: Butterfly shrimp by cutting vertically down the back of the shrimp. Hold the shrimp firmly with one hand and slice halfway through the shrimp.

steps.title: Beat the eggs and water together until yolks are broken.
steps.content: Beat the eggs and water together until yolks are broken. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Dip the shrimp in the egg-water mixture.
steps.content: Dip the shrimp in the egg-water mixture.

steps.title: Add the shrimp to the Panko crumbs.
steps.content: Add the shrimp to the Panko crumbs.

steps.title: Remove shrimp from bag and dip again in egg-water mixture.
steps.content: Remove shrimp from bag and dip again in egg-water mixture.

steps.title: Return to Panko crumbs in bag.
steps.content: Return to Panko crumbs in bag.

steps.title: Fry
steps.content: Fry in hot oil at 350 °F (177 °C) until golden, about 3 minutes. You may have to turn the shrimp to evenly brown them. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Drain the fried shrimp on paper towels.
steps.content: Drain the fried shrimp on paper towels. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Keep shrimp warm while frying batches of shrimp.
steps.content: Keep shrimp warm while frying batches of shrimp.

steps.title: Serve with lemon wedges, cocktail sauce or tartar sauce.
steps.content: Serve with lemon wedges , cocktail sauce or tartar sauce . [8] X Research source
